structure.unit: B KENTUCKY PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION INFRASTRUCTURE AUTHORITY

law.catch_line: Project planning or work done prior to establishment of an authority.
law.text: For a project for which preliminary planning or other work has been undertaken prior to the establishment of an authority, the authority shall follow all previous agreements, records of decision, or contracts entered into by the Commonwealth, subject to any modification necessary as a result of the implementation of this chapter.
law.history: Created 2009 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 97, effective June 26, 2009.
